name: PASS Technologies
description:
Founded in 1989, the PASS Group is a leading provider of On-demand Software Testing services, located in Zurich, Berlin, Belgrade, Boston, Bangalore and Mumbai.
PASS operates its own crowdsourcing marketplace passbrains.com for software testing services and IT expert knowledge. Through passbrains.com, customers gain instant access to the skills of the most qualified testing professionals worldwide, allowing for on-demand testing of web-, mobile- and enterprise applications, covering most major test configurations and language versions.
PASS Group offers consulting, project management and managed quality assurance and testing services to different industries including Healthcare & Life Science, Electronics & Equipment, Finance, Insurance, Retail, Energy, Telecommunications, Transportation & Logistics.
